desc: Ever wonder how Penn State got to where it is today as home of the greatest show in college football, largest student-run philanthropy on the planet, leading fundraising university, and research powerhouse?

layout.text: Ever wonder how Penn State became what it is today: home of the greatest show in college football, the largest student-run philanthropy on the planet, a top research university, and a fundraising powerhouse?
Paperback and E-book can be purchased via Amazon
